name: Refugee Camp Simulator
description:
This game is a submission to the 152nd Weekly Game Jam. The week's theme is "Shelter"

Manage a Camp

You will receive refugees regularly and they will go to work or school every day. You will spend money on building houses and teaching refugees at school.

Educate Refugees

While refugees may come from different sectors and with different backgrounds, you will be tasked to teach them new skills for living in this country and also to learn the local language to help them integrate better into society.

Political Pressure!

As expected, not everyone welcomes refugees to the nation. Your job as the manager is to maintain the camp and its citizens and protect their best interests while also balancing the expectations from politicians and the general public.
